sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define the content and SEO plan to grow qualified traffic and intent, aligned to product value and buyer journey.

sections.title: Keyword Strategy
sections.content: Topic clusters, primary/secondary keywords, search intent mapping, and content briefs.

sections.title: Content Calendar & Formats
sections.content: Editorial calendar, formats (blog, docs, video), production workflow, quality bar, and approvals.

sections.title: Technical SEO
sections.content: Site performance, schema markup, sitemaps, robots, internal linking, canonicalization, and CWV.

sections.title: Distribution & Backlinks
sections.content: Distribution channels, partnerships, outreach, and backlink strategy with white-hat policies.

sections.title: Analytics & Reporting
sections.content: Rank tracking, impressions/CTR, conversion tracking, and reporting cadence.
